extendedInfo.description: he Breathe Together app allows you to experience connection by breathing together synchronously with everyone currently logged into the Universal Breathing Room on DoAsOne.com. The orb pulsates to the sound of breath, leading you into a deep, slow breath flow. The map in the app shows where everyone you are consciously breathing with is located around the world in real-time. You can even choose an intention to infuse into your breathing session by using the âintentionizeâ feature.At a pace of five breaths per minute, Breathe Together will help you instill the power of deep, conscious breathing as you oxygenate your body, heighten awareness and increase your overall health and wellness.Come Breathe Together with people from around the world in the Universal Breathing Room!Do As One is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization - our mission is to serve and connect humanity by establishing a legacy of healthy, conscious breathing.

reviews.title: Alas still force close after few breath
reviews.comment: So sad, I love the website. No option, no flexibility. I am looking for an app which allow me to program the length of inspire, expire and the length of the session with the sound of breath.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome breathing app
reviews.comment: The only issue I have is that it force closes when syncing with the breathing room randomly. Highly recommend for anyone for a quick breath or an extended session. A+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do As One one the go.
reviews.comment: Do as one has been my quick relaxation break from the daily grind for years, it\'s wonderful to see a mobile version that I can take with me. This morning I had the pleasure of breathing with hundreds around the world from my car on my drive into work. Just fantastic. Side by side with my computer the orbs sync up in perfect unison, and the simple interface makes it easy to use. The mapping feature is pretty slick makes it is easy to see the people I am breathing with from around the globe. Great job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, powerful, concept
reviews.comment: If this app didn\'t force close after just a few breaths, I\'d gladly give if 5 stars. If you fix this bug this app will be PERFECT. :)
reviews.author: Melani Marie

reviews.title: Great start but has a serious bug
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the website many times and think it\'s a fantastic concept so had high hopes for the app.  The app seems to have captured the basic interface but there don\'t seem to be any customisation features like the website has for setting a timer for example.  Quite a critical flaw is that it seems to stop when the screen blacks out.  So if your phone dulls the screen after an amount of time to save on power you will not be able to use this without disabling this.  This could be something which is only a problem on my phone because my phone locks shortly after the screen going black.  The app definitely has potential but at this stage it\'s still buggy.
reviews.author: Jordan De Souza
